english.segment1: Consider my affliction and please deliver me. Plead my cause and redeem me. Salvation is not for the wicked. For they don't seek your word. Great are your tender mercies Lord
english.segment2: Revive me, according to your loving kindness. Revive me, that I may seek your word. Revive me, according to your loving kindness. Revive me, oh Lord
english.segment3: You give me understanding. According to your word. Great peace for those who seek your face. I long for salvation. My lips shall praise your name. I rejoice in the treasure of your keep
english.segment4: Revive me, according to your loving kindness. Revive me, that I may seek your word. Revive me, according to your loving kindess. Revive me, oh Lord
english.segment5: For all my ways are before you. I let your hand become my help. My soul longs and adores you. Let my cry come before you oh Lord
english.segment6: Revive me, according to your loving kindness. Revive me, that I may seek your word. Revive me, according to your loving kindnes. Revive me, oh Lord
